What it is: Strips the illusion from your addiction by portraying it as a cursed object.
How to use it: Describe the addiction. Ask AI to render it as a cursed mythic item that drains power.
What it changes: Breaks enchantment and reduces compulsive pull.

What it is: Swaps a toxic habit or relationship with a symbolic counterpart that fulfills its role constructively.
How to use it: Describe the toxic pattern. Ask AI to design a mythic substitute with the same psychic function.
What it changes: Provides transformation by preserving function, not form.

What it is: Designs a symbolic structure that lets you release internal tension without collapse.
How to use it: Describe your mental pressure. Ask AI to design a ritual or symbol for safe release.

What it is: Turns your suffering into a series of intentional symbolic trials.
How to use it: List your recent pain. Ask AI to sequence them as mythic ordeals toward transcendence.
What it changes: Elevates pain into a structured ladder of transformation.

What it is: Identifies internal protectors that block progress and interprets their symbolic roles.
How to use it: List your resistance. Ask AI to name and explain the symbolic gatekeepers behind it.
What it changes: Negotiates resistance by respecting internal boundaries.

What it is: Creates a mythic vow ceremony to bind your intent to action.
How to use it: Describe your goal. Ask AI to ritualize the commitment in symbolic terms.
What it changes: Turns loose intent into sacred obligation.

What it is: Asks what must symbolically die for your life to regenerate.
How to use it: Name whatâ€™s no longer working. Ask AI what part of identity must be sacrificed.
What it changes: Clarifies necessity of loss and accelerates rebirth.

What it is: Turns your deepest wound into a sacred script that defines your purpose.
How to use it: Describe your pain. Ask AI to inscribe it as mythic writing across your symbolic form.

Prompt: Symbolic House of the Forgotten Self
What it is: Builds a symbolic home for the part of you you abandoned.
How to use it: Name what you neglected. Ask AI to create a house for its return.
What it changes: Restores dignity to buried identities and welcomes their voice.

What it is: Maps the symbolic edge of what you are no longer willing to tolerate.
How to use it: List recent violations. Ask AI to construct the symbolic perimeter that ends them.
What it changes: Defines psychic sovereignty and enforces inner law.
